description: Try our easy to follow Ice-Cream Stack recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ice-Cream Stack Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cup vanilla ice cream, slightly softened

recipeInstructions.text: Line 4 x 1/3 cup (80ml) muffin pan holes with plastic wrap. Divide ice-cream among the holes and press the ice cream into the muffin holes to take shape. Refreeze for 3 hours or until firm.
Stir cinnamon, sugar, honey and water in a pan over low heat until sugar dissolves. Simmer on low heat for 5 minutes.

Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a 20x30cm baking pan with paper. Cut pastry sheets in half. Brush each with butter and layer on top of each other in pan. Prick with a fork. Bake for 15 minutes until golden.
Remove pastry from oven. Pour half the syrup over. Set aside to soften. Add fruit to the remaining syrup.
Cut out 8x7cm rounds from pastry and place 4 onto serving plates. Remove ice-cream from pan and place onto filo. Top with second filo rounds, fruit and syrup. Garnish with mint and serve.
